page.title: 03A weeks news in Bromsgrove
page.content: {MONDAY }Today Sally aged 11 won a cat show at the biggest cat show in Britain at the N.E.C in Birmingham and walked off with a Challenge certificate. {TUESDAY}Bromsgrove is twinned with Grouna as you probably know.They are looking for teachers and pupils to take part in the Exchange project. {WEDNESDAY }The fight to save Bromsgrove's Forelands hospital has snowballed into{3,000 }petition protests. {THURSDAY }A local teenager will soon be flying the most advanced Jet in the world.Steven Hatheway is aged 18 and lives in Stoke Prior. {FRIDAY }Two young children at Catshill first school have won a Christmas card compotition by designing their own Christmas cards that cost 30 pence each.
